weights.explanation: Integers only. Set a fixed probability that charts of each difficulty level will be drawn.

check.title: Prevents very unlikely outcomes (e.g. multiple 17s drawn when at 10% chance)
check.label: Force Expected Distribution

controls.invalid: Couldn't draw anything with current settings!

en.about: App inspired by work from Jeff Lloyd. * Weighted distribution code contributed by Chris Chike. * Jacket images prepared by FuriousDCSL. * Japanese localization made possible by nalpan. * DRS data provided by Joseph Bowersox. * SDVX data made possible by Vincent Nguyen. * Maintained by Noah Manneschmidt.

ja.useWeightedDistributions: レベル別に確率を設定する

weights.explanation: 各レベルごとに数字で出やすさの重みを付ける

check.title: 「17に10%が設定されている状態で17が2つ以上ドローされる」というような非常にまれな結果を除外
check.label: 厳密に設定を反映する

controls.invalid: 対象譜面がありません！
